description_txt: stated on June 8, 2017 in in an official statement:
quote_txt: Says former FBI Director James Comey admitted to leaking classified information.

description_txt: stated on May 25, 2017 in a speech at City & State’s State of NY Women forum:
quote_txt: "We have pay equity. When you think about that wage gap, we all know it's 78 cents to the dollar. Well, in New York state it's 90 cents to the dollar."

description_txt: stated on June 6, 2017 in a speech:
quote_txt: "Seventy-seven of the top 300 cities with the highest poverty rate" nationwide are in California.

description_txt: stated on June 2, 2017 in Fox News The Five show:
quote_txt: "Every single year that there's an increase (in temperature) it's within the margin of error -- meaning it isn't increasing."

description_txt: stated on May 31, 2017 in an interview:
quote_txt: "The best estimate is that 200,000 people in Wisconsin were either denied or chilled in their efforts to vote" in the 2016 presidential election.

description_txt: stated on May 11, 2017 in a legislative hearing:

description_txt: stated on June 1, 2017 in a speech at the White House:
quote_txt: "China will be allowed to build hundreds of additional coal plants. So we can’t build the plants, but they can, according to this (Paris) agreement."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2017 in an interview on Fox News Sunday:

quote_txt: "Since the fourth quarter of last year until most recently, we've added almost 50,000 jobs in the coal sector. In the month of May alone, almost 7,000 jobs."

description_txt: stated on June 4, 2017 in an interview on ABC "This Week":
